scientific_explanation: The AI jointly optimized thermal conditions and composite composition to balance pore hierarchy and mechanical stability. The moderate pyrolysis temperature (396°C) creates a stable carbon framework while preserving reactive functional groups. Chemical activation with HCl introduces micropores critical for CO₂ capture. The composite formulation (65% biochar, 35% binder) provides sufficient mechanical strength while maintaining high porosity, resulting in a predicted CO₂ adsorption capacity of 0.761 mmol/g with 70% confidence.
